long_description: Spy Frazier Polarized Sunglasses for men deliver the eye protection you need for all your outdoor sports. Bronze polarized polycarbonate lenses with Green Spectra finish cut almost all glare, block about 86% of visible light and block 100% of harmful UV rays. Lenses tone down brightness without distorting colors; great for driving and other activities where high contrast is needed. Grilamid frames are lightweight and impact-resistant. Rubber nose and temple pads stay on securely, even when wet. Lenses are injected in a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles.
short_description: Spy Frazier Polarized Sunglasses for men deliver the eye protection you need for all your outdoor sports.
